wordGroup: vermiform appendix n. 阑尾；蚓突

sentences.en: Full details are given in Appendix 3.
We are not certain whether the appendix had already burst or not.
sentences.cn: 我们不能确定阑尾破了没有。

sentences.en: The book also includes an appendix with a listing of all U.S. presidents.
sentences.cn: 这本书还包含一个列有所有美国总统的附录。
